name: Brave Fisherman (Tapptick Games)
description:
it's on google store now:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.code8bit.bravefisherman

Once upon a time there was a fisherman who went upon the sea and threw his nets into the water to collect fish, treasure chests, more fish, diamonds, fish... Beware of deadly pirate chests and severe storms!

Brave Fisherman is about surviving the storms and getting the highest score as possible. Brave Fisherman is a fast-paced game and the challanges rise up as you keep sailing. You compete with other players via online leaderboards.

Brave Fisherman is free to play.
